headline: EBARA TECHNOLOGIES DRY VACUUM PUMP 297 CFM
description: Dry Pump    Pumping speed and ultimate pressure is based on 60 Hz operation
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Ebara
Model A70W
Pumping Speed 297.0 CFM (8,392.5 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 1.30E-3(En) torr (1.73E-3 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 50.0 mm (1.969 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Power Requirements 220 V 30.0 A 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 16.000 in (40.6 cm)
Depth 40.000 in (101.6 cm)
Height 35.000 in (88.9 cm)
Weight 744 lb (337 kg)
